tidbits.title: Land of a Thousand Lakes
tidbits.description: Finland is known as the 'Land of a Thousand Lakes,' boasting around 188,000 lakes, offering serene landscapes for nature enthusiasts.

tidbits.title: Sauna Culture
tidbits.description: Finland has a strong sauna culture, with over 2 million saunas in the country, providing a significant part of Finnish social life and relaxation.

tidbits.title: Education Excellence
tidbits.description: The country is recognized for its exceptional education system, emphasizing equality and innovative teaching methods, ranking high in global education assessments.
